mcq.statement: Who was the first Chief Justice of Pakistan, and what significant decision is he known for in Pakistanâ€™s early judicial history?

options.a: Justice Abdur Rashid, who presided over the oath of the first Governor-General
options.b: Justice Shahabuddin, known for his emphasis on parliamentary supremacy
options.c: Justice Shahabuddin, known for his emphasis on parliamentary supremacy Justice Munir, known for the doctrine of necessity in the Maulvi Tamizuddin case
